title: Tom Daley Goes Global
overview: Tom Daley Goes Global follows the travelling adventures of the diving sensation as he embarks on a whistle-stop backpacking trip.Cameras will follow Tom and his best friend Sophie as they kiss their families goodbye, pack their bags and head for the wilds of some of the most incredible countries on earth such as Thailand, Japan, Australia, Morocco and New Zealand.The trip will be a life-changing experience that will see Tom as he's never been seen before- roughing it in hostels, sleeping on night trains and making new friends â€“ as he takes in everything typical of a student-backpacking trip in just six weeks.
